Teaching Assistant, University of Miami Research Assistant, Cornell University Research Assistant, University of Maryland Postdoctoral Fellow, Variety Children's Research Foundation, Miami, Florida Research Associate, Variety Children's Research Foundation, Miami, Florida Medical College of Georgia, Augusta, Georgia: Assistant Professor of Microbiology. 1965-1969 Associate Professor of Microbiology, 1969-1972 Texas Tech University Health Sciences Center, Lubbock, Texas Associate Professor, Department of Microbiology. 1979-1979 Professor, Department of Microbiology, 1979- Present Associate Dean of the Graduate School.
